mapper.delete: delete from member where memberid = #{memberid} and BLACKLIST_YN ='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into out_member (MEMBERID, PW, EMAIL, NAME, BIRTH, PHONENUMBER, BLACKLIST_YN, OUT_MEMBER_DATE) values((select MEMBERID from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select PW from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select EMAIL from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select NAME from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select BIRTH from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select PHONENUMBER from member where memberid=#{memberid}),(select BLACKLIST_YN from member where memberid=#{memberid}),sysdate)
